column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I had the CLASSIC RIBEYE - CHICAGO CUT
column2: which I've had at least three times before. Cooked perfectly
column4: while I like a good amount of fat in a well-marbled steak
column5: I don't think I've ever had a steak that was so fatty
column6: not at the sides but within the (otherwise) meaty inside of the steak. All I'm saying
column8: is that a lot of my too-meager steak was comprised of big chunks of fat. That made the price even less appealing to me--and almost offensive--though it was a delicious steak
column9: and I like the bearnaise and sea salt.
